title: Create shortcuts documentation
description: Generate a README.md file documenting custom Zsh aliases, keybindings, functions, Tmux shortcuts, and Helix configurations.
acceptance_criteria: 1. README.md exists in the project root. 2. Content accurately reflects the current configuration files. 3. Formatting follows a clear, structured layout.
close_reason: Generated SHORTCUTS.md documenting custom Zsh aliases, keybindings, functions, Tmux shortcuts, and Helix configurations.

title: Centralize k9s configuration
description: Move k9s configuration and themes to the dotfiles repository for consistent environments.
acceptance_criteria: k9s configuration exists in .config/k9s, installer script manages symlinks, k9s loads configuration correctly.

title: Initialize k9s directory structure
description: Create .config/k9s and .config/k9s/skins directories in the repository.

title: Transfer k9s configuration files
description: Copy config.yaml, aliases.yaml, and skins/tokyoNight.yaml from ~/Library/Application Support/k9s to .config/k9s.

title: Develop k9s installer script
description: Create .zsh/installers/k9s.sh to manage symlinks for k9s configuration.

title: Verify and track k9s changes
description: Confirm k9s functionality and track new files with yadm.
close_reason: Verified k9s configuration and installer integration.

title: Suppress background job logs
description: Silence job notifications during dotfiles initialization by wrapping background tasks in subshells with MONITOR disabled.
acceptance_criteria: 1. .zsh/plugins.sh silences plugin management jobs. 2. .zsh/zshrc_manager.sh silences installer jobs. 3. Shell reload produces no job-related output.
close_reason: Implemented subshell wrappers with 'unsetopt MONITOR' in .zsh/plugins.sh and .zsh/zshrc_manager.sh to silence background job notifications. Verified syntax with zsh -n.

title: Fix terminal compatibility and job log suppression
description: Address 'unknown terminal' errors by adding a TERM fallback and fixing draw_line. Ensure job logs are silenced by using setopt NO_NOTIFY and NO_CHECK_JOBS in subshells.
acceptance_criteria: 1. TERM falls back to xterm-256color if unknown. 2. draw_line handles tput failures gracefully. 3. Background jobs produce no output on remote servers.
close_reason: Implemented TERM fallback for unknown terminals and fixed draw_line to handle tput failures. Enhanced job suppression with setopt NO_NOTIFY and NO_CHECK_JOBS in subshells.
